author: stefanbratanov
content:
hi, I am testing an ecdsa signing in my implementation versus the latest version of the sequencer and getting 
```
Failed to deserialize the JSON body into the target type: unknown field `ecdsaSignature`, expected `contributions` or `ecdsa_signature` at line 1 column 6258317
```
I suppose the sequencer should be changed to expect camelCase to align with the contribution schema?

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: > Your the Sequencer has chosen you to contribute next.

author: kevaundray
content:
Did a quick skim of the document, some nits you might want to consider:

> "p1": "Success! Your contribution has been permanently fused with the others in this Summoning Ceremony.",
> "p1": "The Ceremony requires three random inputs from each Contributor.",

Should "summoning ceremony" and "Contributor" be lower case?

>  "p1": "Your the Sequencer has chosen you to contribute next.",

Suggestion: The Sequencer has chosen you to contribute next."

> "p1": "This signature binds  your entropy contribution to your Ethereum address, this allows you and others to verify it was indeed you that made this contribution."

Suggestion: This signature binds your entropy contribution to your Ethereum address. This allows others to verify it was you that made this contribution.

(Super nit üòÖ : there is two spaces between the words "binds" and "your")

I removed the "you and others" part as it flowed a bit better.

>  "p2": "<Bold>Secret:</Bold> Enter a secret in text form, with random characters added. A hope for the future, or the name of someone dear.",

Suggestion: Type a secret with random characters added. A hope for the future, or the name of someone dear.
Suggestion : Type a random secret.

> "i1": "Search Eth address, GitHub handle..."

Suggestion: Search Ethereum address, Github handle...

(Seems we use Ethereum everywhere else ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è )

> "p2": "It does not send any funds or permit any contracts. This method also allows us to deliver a POAP after the Ceremony.",

The first part reads a bit awkwardly for me. Can we use the proper noun instead of It here?

>  "p1": "This Trusted Setup is a multi-party ceremony designed to generate a secure SRS (structured reference string) to be used in the proto-danksharding protocol. OK, let‚Äôs slow down and talk about those terms in more detail.",

Suggestion: "to be used" -> that will be used

author: kevaundray
content:
>  "p2": "Proto-danksharding (aka EIP-4844) is a planned change to the Ethereum protocol which allows transaction data from rollups (Layer 2s) to be succinctly represented on the Layer 1 (mainnet). The benefits are lower transaction fees on the L2, greater scalability and more accessibility to more people!",

Suggestion: "the Layer 1" -> Layer 1
Suggestion: "the L2" -> L2

>  "p3": "The Trusted Setup is a preparatory step required for certain cryptographic schemes such as the KZG polynomial commitment scheme to be used in proto-danksharding. In our case, the trust assumption is that one contributor needs to successfully conceal their secret for the result to be secure.",

In my head, when I read conceal, it just implies that they should not share it with anyone else. This does imply security, it might be informative to also add that they should discard it too.

>  "p4": "It‚Äôs a multi-party ceremony: Contributors each create a secret and run a computation to mix it with previous contributions and generate a result that can be made public and passed to the next contributor. We need to guard against attempts to control the ceremony, so you‚Äôll need an Ethereum or GitHub account with an established history."

Suggestion: It's a multi-party computation: Each contributor creates a secret. They then run a computation to mix their secret with previous contributions, to generate a result that can be made public and passed to the next contributor. To guard against attempts to control the ceremony, you will need to provide an Ethereum or GitHub account with an established history.

>  "copyRight": "Build by Privacy & Scaling Explorations (PSE). 2022",

Suggestion: Build -> Built

(copyRight should be "copyright", no?)

> "p1": "Kindly stay online while you wait for your turn to contribute."

Suggestion: Kindly stay online and wait for your turn to contribute.

author: kevaundray
content: Suggestions are based on what flowed better in my head, so might be wrong üòÖ
